channel.title: Making A New pure
channel.description:
hi im making a new p2p pure idk wat skill's i should put before i even attack something..well i came up qith some so here we..
40 attk 80 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer 60 attk 70 str 1 def 70 range 60 mage 32 prayer 1 attk 1 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 52 prayer 1 attk 1 str 70 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer well errr..idk post some more or choose thnk's anicnet Weed :cool:

item.title: Making A New pure
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:7, topic:91503”]1 def
70+ att
85+ str
85+ range
85+ mage
and 52 pray if you want to do desert treasure easily.
Also if you want the str and range you can pc for it quickly, in 1 month or so you’d be easily 90 range.[/quote]

Read full topic

Lol rune defender, I got like 40 of them in bank. The cyclops are good for training you can also get lvl 3 clues from them.

item.title: Making A New pure
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:8, topic:91503”]A current staking build which everyone seems to be in to currently:
70 attack
50 strength
70 defence
They’ll also use Veracs or Torags w/ whip.

I’m making my third strength pure.
70 attack
80 strength
1 defence
1 prayer
70 ranged
CB - 64[/quote]
Good luck i’m geting a rune defender first

Read full topic

item.title: Making A New pure
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Ooo Java, post:5, topic:91503”][quote author=error.login link=topic=133295.msg1290038#msg1290038 date=1178741538]
Try
50 attack | 85+ Str | 50 Mage | 43 Prayer

50 attack and 80 str for Obby Maul 50 mage for snare i think thats right? and 43 prayer for protect from melee, range, mage and item protect
[/quote]
Naw, Your a noob tbh. Real Pkers don’t use Protect Against Melee/mage and range…[/quote]
i know… but it helpes when your on your own being attacked by a few ppl

Read full topic

item.title: Making A New pure
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

[quote=“h44ckzor pwnage, post:2, topic:91503”]40 attk 80 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer- This is pointless, What good is 80 strength with no dragon weapon?

1 attk 1 str 70 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer- This one is pricey but will pay off.

60 attk 70 str 1 def 70 range 60 mage 32 prayer- This would be the one to go for IF you are going with melee.

1 attk 1 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 52 prayer- This one is no point because you will die to fast.[/quote]
Dumbass on some,
1st one would be a good Obby Mauler. If you do that, get 50 attack instead of 40? Then be a mauler. Like “Range u k0” at good friend.
2nd one is good.
Like the 3rd, Like my goals on my pure, But tbh, Fuck Prayer. Unless you pk. Then Keep It that way.
4th is Bad… H44ck, your a dick tbh. That would own. IF you had 20 defence for Mystic.

Read full topic

item.title: Making A New pure
item.dc:creator: @h44ckzor_pwnage h44ckzor pwnage
item.description:
@h44ckzor_pwnage wrote:

40 attk 80 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer- This is pointless, What good is 80 strength with no dragon weapon?

1 attk 1 str 70 def 70 range 70 mage 1 prayer- This one is pricey but will pay off.

60 attk 70 str 1 def 70 range 60 mage 32 prayer- This would be the one to go for IF you are going with melee.

1 attk 1 str 1 def 70 range 70 mage 52 prayer- This one is no point because you will die to fast.
